sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { FaMapMarkerAlt, FaCalendarDay, FaMale, FaPlus } from 'react-icons/fa'
import { DropdownComponent } from '../../components/dropdown'
import { InputFrom } from '../../components/inputForm'

import {
  AddButton,
  AddButtonContainer,
  CardBody,
  CardContainer,
  CardForm,
  CardFormInputs,
  CardHeader,
  CardTitle,
  SearchButton,
  SectionSearch,
} from './styles'

export const Home: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <SectionSearch>
      <CardContainer>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle>Trip</CardTitle>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardBody>
          <CardForm>
            <CardFormInputs>
              <InputFrom
                type='text'
                name='origin'
                label='City of origin'
                icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
              />

              {/* <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='origin' id='origin' />
                <FormInputLabel>City of origin</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />

                <DropdownComponent
                  cities={[
                    ['test 1', 0, 1],
                    ['test 2', 0, 1],
                  ]}
                />
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='destiny' id='destiny' />
                <FormInputLabel>City of destination</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='text' name='trip-date' id='trip-date' />
                <FormInputLabel>Date of the trip</FormInputLabel>
                <FaCalendarDay size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer>
              <FormInputContainer>
                <FormInput type='number' name='passengers' id='passengers' />
                <FormInputLabel>Number of passengers</FormInputLabel>
                <FaMale size={24} />
              </FormInputContainer> */}
            </CardFormInputs>
            <AddButtonContainer>
              <AddButton>
                <FaPlus size={12} />
                Add intermediate city
              </AddButton>
            </AddButtonContainer>
            <SearchButton>Search</SearchButton>
          </CardForm>
        </CardBody>
      </CardContainer>
    </SectionSearch>
  )
}
